name: Dragabond
description:
Here's the Liliuo.io link: https://liluo.io/mistafixxa069/dragabond

Drag a small dude with a top hat around, place him within the blue circles to score some points! Avoid the huge dangerous spikes and try to get a high score~!!!

All art and sfx were made by me.

The font is VCR OSD Mono by mrmanet

Game BG music by: rezoner
Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/rezoner
Twitter: https://twitter.com/rezoner

Main Menu music by: Fato_Shadow
Instagram: fatih.karimoff
